mainChat

Interface ModelInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Model

    public interface ModelInterface
    The model interface for define a data structure for a chat. The class that is interested to developing a data structure for a chat implements this interface
    Author:
    Francesco Cozzolino, Stefano Belli
